snippet: The charges against a former defense minister, as well as two current Defense Ministry officials, led some to fear a wave of reprisals against the defeated government.
abstract: Georgian authorities bring criminal assault charges against Bacho Akhalaia, former defense minister, and two current Defense Ministry officials, in what some lawmakers fear presages wave of reprisals against Pres Mikheil Saakashvili's defeated government; Akhalaia allegedly attacked six service men in 2011 after they complained of bad living conditions.
lead_paragraph: The charges against a former defense minister, as well as two current Defense Ministry officials, led some to fear a wave of reprisals against the defeated government.

headline.seo: In Georgia, Criminal Charges Against Saakashvili Ally
headline.main: Ally of Former Georgian Leader Faces Criminal Charges
headline.print_headline: Ally of Former Georgian Leader Faces Criminal Charges
